Name: Containers
About the game: Enhance your Windows experience with Containers Containers allows the storage of your files and folders in boxes called “Container” , these boxes can be accessed at any time on your desktop or called thanks to built-in shortcuts or with the help of the “Containers Tab” menu. Containers Containers are sticked to your desktop when you don't use them. Mirror Containers “Mirror” Containers are representations of files and folders in a selected folder on your computer. Container Customization Containers can have different colored backgrounds or a background with an image. You can also set the transparency method of your Containers. If you are on Windows 11 you can also choose between Containers with rounded or squared edges. Containers Tab Menu The Containers Tab menu allows you to call the Container of your choice without leaving the application in the foreground, it works similarly to the Alt-Tab menu in Windows. Closing Containers Containers can be independently closed manually or automatically to save space. Sorting Containers content You can independently sort the contents of your Containers according to your choice. Container content size You can change the size of your Container icons at any time. Shortcuts The Containers application has shortcuts to help you manipulate your Containers, each shortcut can be modified and disabled.
